titles.title: Brownfield Cleanup Enhancement Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the incentives for the environmental cleanup of certain contaminated industrial sites designated as brownfields.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/28/2003--Introduced. Brownfield Cleanup Enhancement Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited credit to holders of qualified brownfields cleanup bonds. Sets a national limit on the amount of such bonds and provides for allocation among the States.
